DataElement.preferredName: Recurrent Disease Testis Or Ovary Present Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not recurrent disease was present in the testes or ovaries.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Recurrent Disease Testis Or Ovary Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The return of a disease after a period of remission._Either of the paired male reproductive glands that produce the male germ cells and the male hormones._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._One of the paired female reproductive glands containing the ova or germ cells; the ovary's stroma is a vascular connective tissue containing numbers of ovarian follicles enclosing the ova._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The return of a disease after a period of remission.

Concepts.definition: The return of a disease after a period of remission.
